original_title: AAP defies CDC guidance with COVID vaccine recommendation for kids | Fox News
article_summary: American Academy of Pediatrics recommends COVID-19 vaccines for children aged 6 months to 23 months and high-risk children older than 2, going against the CDC's recent guidance that no longer recommends the vaccine for children. The CDC now suggests shared clinical decision-making between parents and doctors for COVID-19 vaccination.</s>
